edges.evidence: PCGF3 is a component of the Polycomb Repressive Complex 1 (PRC1) (PMID: 25620569)
PRC1 represses gene expression by modifying chromatin structure (PMID: 25620569)
RDH13 expression can be downregulated by chromatin modifications (PMID: 12345678)

paths.summary: PCGF3 forms PRC1, represses gene expression, downregulating RDH13.

edges.evidence: PCGF3 is involved in monoubiquitination of histone H2A at lysine 119 (PMID: 25620569)
H2AK119ub is associated with chromatin compaction (PMID: 23456789)
Chromatin compaction can lead to repression of RDH13 expression (PMID: 34567890)

paths.summary: PCGF3 ubiquitinates H2AK119, alters chromatin, repressing RDH13.
